st: Pata hi nahi chala kab wo dost se pyar ban gaya,
s:
Pata hi nahi chala kab wo dost se pyar ban gaya,
Sath gujra hua kuch pal aaj yaadgar ban gaya,
Kar na sake unse izhaar hum is baat ka,
Aur dekhte hi dekhte woh kisi aur ke dildar ban gaye.

st: शराब पीता हूँ मैं तो इसमें भला क्या बुराई है,
s:
शराब पीता हूँ मैं तो इसमें भला क्या बुराई है,
ताना देने वालों मुझसे पूछो क्या गमे जुदाई है।

प्यार हुआ है जबसे ‘मैं’ कहीं खो सा गया हूँ,
इश्क़ करने वालों उल्फ़त से अच्छी तनहाई है।

दिल टूटा दर्द हुआ अश्क निकले मैं खूब रोया,
पहले हाले दिल तनहाई था अब दर्दे दिल तनहाई है।

रिश्ते टूटे आस छूटी अब क्यूँ जीऊँ क्यूँ कमाऊ,
अब ऐसा कौन है शहर में जिससे मेरी आशनाई है।

जाम लगा जो होठों से तो दिल को सुकून मिला थोड़ा,
मैखाना है अपना या साकी है, बाकी दुनिया हरजाई है।

दिल मेरा दर्द मेरा, शाम मेरी जाम मेरा मर्जी मेरी,
ऐ दुनिया तुझे भुलाने की बस यही महफूज दवाई है।

st: Ruk Ja Subah Tak Hai Ye Raat Aakhri,
s:
Ruk Ja Subah Tak Hai Ye Raat Aakhri,
Zindagi Ki hai Ye Mulaqaat Aakhri,
Tum Mere Janaze Ko Kandha Jarur Dena,
kon jaane Hoga Mera Ye Safar Tere Sath Aakhri.

st: muskurati aankho se afsana likha tha,
s:
muskurati aankho se afsana likha tha,
shayad apka meri zindagi mein aana likha tha,
taqdeer to dekho mere ansuon ki,
inka bhi aapki yaad mein beh jana likha tha.

st: Sache pyar mein nikle aansu aur,
s:
Sache pyar mein nikle aansu aur,
rote hue bache ke aansu ek saman hote hai,
kyu ki dono ko pata to hai ki dard kya hai,
par kisi ko bata nahi sakte.

st: Pyar Karke Jataye Ye Jaruri To Nahi,
s:
Pyar Karke Jataye Ye Jaruri To Nahi,
Yaad Karke Koi Bataye Ye Jaruri To Nahi,
Rone Wala To Dil Mein Hi Roo Leta Hai,
Aankh Mein Aansu Aaye Ye Jaruri To Nahi.

st: Hame Satane Ki Jarurat Kya Thi,
s:
Hame Satane Ki Jarurat Kya Thi,
Dil Mera Jalane Ki Jarurat Kya Thi,
Ishq Nahi Tha Mujse To Keh Diya Hota,
Majak mera yu Banane Ki Jarurat Kya Thi.

st: Koi dikha ke roye, koi chipa ke roye,
s:
Koi dikha ke roye, koi chipa ke roye,
hume rulaane wale hume rulake roye,
Marne ka maza to tab hai yaaron,
jab qaatil bhi janaaze pe aakar roye.

st: Gham Jab Tera Had Se Guzar Jata Hai,
s:
Gham Jab Tera Had Se Guzar Jata Hai,
To Kagaz Par Syahi Bankar Bikhar Jata Hai,
kehte Hai Log Pyar Aisa Hi Hota Hai,
Jitna Milta Nahi Usse Zyada kahi Kho Jata Hai.

st: Bhale hi kisi gair ki jaagir hai tu,
s:
Bhale hi kisi gair ki jaagir hai tu,
Par mere khwabo ki tasveer hai tu,
Mujhe milti to bhala kaise milti,
kisi or ke hisse ki taqdeer hai tu.

st: Door Rehne Walo Ne aisa Sila Diya,
s:
Door Rehne Walo Ne aisa Sila Diya,
Apni Yaado Se Hamko Rula Diya,
Itna Bhi Matlabi Na Ho Yaar Kisi Ka,
Jab Chaha Pyar Kiya, Jab Chaha Bhula Diya.

st: Dil Par Kisi Ke Yu aitbaar Na Karo,
s:
Dil Par Kisi Ke Yu aitbaar Na Karo,
Dil Se Kisi Ka Intezaar Na Karo,
Kaante Hi Kaante Hai Iss Raah Mein,
Had Se Bhi Zyada Kisi Se Pyaar Na Karo.

st: Samjha Na Koi mere Dil Ki Baat Ko,
s:
Samjha Na Koi mere Dil Ki Baat Ko,
Dard Duniya Ne Bina Soche Hi De Diya,
Jo Seh Gaye Hum Dard Ko Chupke Se,
To Humko Hi sabne Patthar Dil Keh Diya.

st: Roj tha uska naam mere afsane mein,
s:
Roj tha uska naam mere afsane mein,
Thi uski tasveer mere dil ke aashiyane mein,
Mangi thi khuda se dua jiski khushi ke liye,
Use khushi bhi milti thi to mujhe rulane mein.

st: Aaj hum hai kal hamari yaade hogi,
s:
Aaj hum hai kal hamari yaade hogi,
Jab ham na honge tab hamari baate hogi,
Kabhi paltaoge jindagi ke ye panne to,
Shayad aap ki Aankho se bhi barish hogi.

st: Aaj bheegi hai palke uski yaad mein,
s:
Aaj bheegi hai palke uski yaad mein,
aansu bhi simat gaye apne aap mein,
oas ki boonden bikhri hai zameen par,
mano chandni bhi royi ho uski yaad mein.

st: अपनी-अपनी जिदों पर अड़कर,
s:
अपनी-अपनी जिदों पर अड़कर,
नंगे पैर हम तलवार पर चलते रहे,

किसी के मुँह से आह तक ना निकली,
दोनों के पैरों से लहू निकलते रहे.

अपनी-अपनी धुन में थे दोनों,
एक दुसरे को दर्द देकर रोते रहे,

किसी का हाथ ना उठा आंसू पोछने को,
दोनों की आँखों से झरने बहते रहे,

कभी मैं हाँ कहता रहा,
कभी वो ना कहते रहे.

st: Tumhari chahat ne aansu ke tohfe diye,
s:
Tumhari chahat ne aansu ke tohfe diye,
Baaton ne yaado ke tohfe diye.
Isliye andhero se lipat ke roo pade hum,
kyuki ujhalo ne bahut se dhoke diye.

st: Haqiqat Ki Raaho Mein Sapne Toot Jaate Hai,
s:
Haqiqat Ki Raaho Mein Sapne Toot Jaate Hai,
Mausam jo Badle To Phool Bhi Sukh Jaate Hai,
Kabhi Hume Bhi Yaad Kar Liya Karo,
Fir Mat Kehna Ki Dost Kyu Ruth Jaate Hai.

st: Aye Mohabbat Tere Anjaam Pe Rona Aaya,
s:
Aye Mohabbat Tere Anjaam Pe Rona Aaya,
Jaane Kyu Aaj Tere Naam Pe Rona Aaya,
Yu To Har Shaam Umeedo Mein Guzar Jaati Thi,
Aaj Kuch Baat Hai, Jo iss Shaam Pe Rona Aaya.

st: Hum Tanha Bankar Bhi Tanha Rahe,
s:
Hum Tanha Bankar Bhi Tanha Rahe,
Kyu Jaane In Sholon Main Jalte Rahe,
Pyar Ki Talaash Kaha-Kaha Nahi Ki maine,
Jannat Mein They Paar Dozak Main Rahe.

st: Tanha Hoon Iss Dard-e-Mohabbat Mein,
s:
Tanha Hoon Iss Dard-e-Mohabbat Mein,
Meri Tarah Behaal Tum Bhi Ho,
Hum Hai Kisi Ujhde Hue Shehar Ki Misaal,
Aankhen Bata Rahi Hai Ki Veeraan Tum Bhi Ho.

st: Uski Chahat Ne Hume Rulaya Bohat,
s:
Uski Chahat Ne Hume Rulaya Bohat,
Uski Yaadon Ne Hume Tadpaya Bohat,
Hum Unse be-panah Mohabbat Karte Hai,
bas ek Iss Majburi Ko Usne Aazmaya Bohat.

st: Apne Be-Dard Mujh Ko Mere Razdaar De,
s:
Apne Be-Dard Mujh Ko Mere Razdaar De,
Kuch Apni Zindagi Pe Mujhe Ikhtiar De,
aisa Na Ho Ki Kal Tu Mera Sath Chod De,
Jitna Nibha Sake aaj Mujhe Utna Hi Pyar De.

st: Naraaz Na Ho Humse Hum Reh na Payenge,
s:
Naraaz Na Ho Humse Hum Reh na Payenge,
ye dil ka Sadma hum kabhi  Seh na Payenge,
Deti Hai Gham-e-Zindagi yu Pal-Pal hume,
Tune Diya To Jeene Se Pehle Hi Mar Jayenge.

st: Behte hue dariya ko ab kya modega koi,
s:
Behte hue dariya ko ab kya modega koi,
Toote hue shishe ko ab kya jodega koi,
Chalo fir se ek dafa vishwas kar ke dekhte hai,
Ab is toote hue dil ko kya todega koi.

st: Maut se dar nahi lagta mujhko,
s:
Maut se dar nahi lagta mujhko,
Tere sajda mein zindagi bitana chahta hu,
Bas kami hai tere rehmo karm ki maula,
main to tere paas aana ab chahta hu.

st: Kuch andhera bhi zaruri hai gham-e-yaar ke sath,
s:
Kuch andhera bhi zaruri hai gham-e-yaar ke sath,
ab diya koi na rakhe meri dewaar ke sath,

main jo ik umer masafat mein raha, tab jana,
rah bhi chalti rahi hai, meri raftaar ke sath,

ham to yusaf nahi, bazaar-e-sukhan mein “faraz”,
yu hi chal parte hai, har ik kharidaar ke sath.

st: har raat ek naam yaad aata hai,
s:
har raat ek naam yaad aata hai,
kabhi subha kabhi sham yaad aata hai,
sochte hai hum kar le dusri mohabbat,
fir pehli mohabbat ka anjaam yaad aata hai.

st: Mile ho aap mujhe to door nahi jaana,
s:
Mile ho aap mujhe to door nahi jaana,
Jindagi akela mujhe chod mat jaana,
Khata ho gayi to maaf kar dena,
magar dusre ke sahare chod mat jaana.

st: Mere dil ke armano ka nasha hai tu,
s:
Mere dil ke armano ka nasha hai tu,
toote hue khwabo ka aksh hai tu,
jana to nahi tha tujhse door mujhe,
gam mein jeene ka dastoor hai tu.

st: Aye dil gujarish hai tujhse, tu dhadkna chod de,
s:
Aye dil gujarish hai tujhse, tu dhadkna chod de,
jo bhi ho anjaam to iski fikar karna chod de,
sahi nhi jati ab teri gustakhiya,
such kehta hu aye dil tu ab mera sath chod de.

st: Dard-E-Dil Ne Dekho Kitne Gham Jhele Hai,
s:
Dard-E-Dil Ne Dekho Kitne Gham Jhele Hai,
Mere Masum Dil Mein Zakhmo Ke Kitne Mele Hai,
Mehfilon Ki Khwahish Thi hume,
Dekho Zindagi Mein Aaj Hum Kitne Akele Hai.

st: Taras Gaye Thodi Si Wafa Ke Liye,
s:
Taras Gaye Thodi Si Wafa Ke Liye,
Kise Se Pyar Na Karenge Khuda Ke Liye,
Jab Bhi Lagti Hai Ishq Ke Adalat,
Hum Hi Kyu tanha reh Jaate Hai Saza Ke Liye.

st: Sapno ki tarah aa kar chale gaye,
s:
Sapno ki tarah aa kar chale gaye,
Apno ko bhula kar chale gaye,
Kis baat ki saza di aap ne humein,
Pehle hasaya phir rulakar chale gaye.

st: Raat din bewafa jis shakhs ko hum kehte hai,
s:
Raat din bewafa jis shakhs ko hum kehte hai,
wo mere dil ke kahin aas paas rehte hai,
muddate ho chali humko unse bichre hue,
aankh se ashq magar aaj bhi kuch behte hai.

st: Log to apna banake chod dete hai,
s:
Log to apna banake chod dete hai,
Rishta gairo se jod lete hai,
Hum to ek phool bhi na tod sake,
Log to dil bhi todh dete hai.

st: Kabhi hum toote to kabhi khawb toote,
s:
Kabhi hum toote to kabhi khawb toote,
na jaane kitne tukron mein armaan toote,
har tukra aaina hai zindagi ka,
har aaine ke saath laakhon jazbaat toote.

st: Badi mannat se meri duniya lutayi hogi,
s:
Badi mannat se meri duniya lutayi hogi,
Meri mohabbat ki hasti mitayi hogi,
Aa tere pairo mein marham laga du.
Mere dil ko thokar marne mein chot to aayi hogi.

st: Zindagi Hai Nadan Isiliye Chup Hoon,
s:
Zindagi Hai Nadan Isiliye Chup Hoon,
Dard Hi Dard Subah Shaam Isiliye Chup Hoon,
Keh Du Zamane Se Dastan Apni,
Usme Aayega Uska Naam Isiliye Chup Hoon.

st: bhigi palko ke sath aankhe nam thi,
s:
bhigi palko ke sath aankhe nam thi,
zindagi unse shuru unpar khatam thi,
wo ruth ke door rehne lage humse,
shayad meri chahat auron se kam thi.

st: Shaam udhas hai subha udhas hai,
s:
Shaam udhas hai subha udhas hai,
kafan mein lipti hui meri laash hai,
aye mere chahnewalo mujhe wahi jalana,
jaha meri aur unki pehli mulakat thi.

st: Jaane duniya mein aisa kyu hota hai,
s:
Jaane duniya mein aisa kyu hota hai,
Jo sab ko khusi de aakhir wahi ku rota hai,
Umar bhar jo sath na de sake wahi insaan,
Zindagi ka pehla pyar kyu hota hai.

st: Khwaab dekhte ab dil thak chuka hai,
s:
Khwaab dekhte ab dil thak chuka hai,
mera har khwaab patthar sa ho rakha hai,
sheesha hota to tootne ka ghum nahi hota,
yeh to patthar hokar fir se toot gaya hai.

st: chal mere hum nashi aaj kahi aur chal,
s:
chal mere hum nashi aaj kahi aur chal,
Iss chaman mein ab apna kahi guzara nahi,
Baat hoti gulon tak to seh lete hum bhi,
Ab to kaanton pe bhi haq hamara nahi.

st: Shikayat Hume Zindagi Se Nahi,
s:
Shikayat Hume Zindagi Se Nahi,
Jee Rahe Hai Magar Khushi Se Nahi,
Dukh Bhi Diya Har Shaqs Ne Hume,
Aur Naraaz Bhi Hum Kisi Se Nahi.

st: Mulaqat maut ki mehmaan ban gayi hai,
s:
Mulaqat maut ki mehmaan ban gayi hai,
Nazar ki duniya veeran ban gayi hai,
Meri saans bhi ab meri nahi rahi, dosto….
Ye zindagi unn par yu kurban ho gayi hai.

st: Na tasveer hai tumhari jo deedar kiya jaaye,
s:
Na tasveer hai tumhari jo deedar kiya jaaye,
Na tum pass ho jo pyaar kiya jaaye,
Yeh kaun sa dard diya hai aap ne,
Na kuch kaha jaaye, na tum bin ab raha jaaye.

st: Tum khafa ho gayi to koi khushi na rahegi,
s:
Tum khafa ho gayi to koi khushi na rahegi,
Tere bina charago mein roshni na rahegi,
Kya kahe kya guzregi dil par mere,
hum zinda bhi rahe to zindagi na rahegi.

st: Aakhiri baar tumhe Likhta hu Khat,
s:
Aakhiri baar tumhe Likhta hu Khat,
Kal Hum Tumhe milne aayenge,
Agar na aaye Tum Milne Hume,
sada Teri Nigaho se Door chale jayenge.

st: Gehri Khamoshi Se Dosti Yoon Ho Gayi,
s:
Gehri Khamoshi Se Dosti Yoon Ho Gayi,
Waqt Ki Raftaar Mein Har Khushi Kho Gayi,
Bune the Humne Kuch Sapne Jo In Aankhon Se,
aayi jo badkismati ki aandhi Sab Kuch Dho Gayi.

st: Wo mausam wo bahar bhi uske saamne kam thi,
s:
Wo mausam wo bahar bhi uske saamne kam thi,
Uske saath gujra wo waqt wo fija bhi nam thi,
Par kya kare aye jaalim hum ye bhool hi gaye,
Apne haatho mein wo mohabbat ki lakeere hi kam thi.

st: Mohobbate muqam har kisi ko nahi milta,
s:
Mohobbate muqam har kisi ko nahi milta,
dilo ka jahan har kisi ko nahi milta,
pyar wo nadi hai jiske raste mein aag ka dariya hai,
tabhi to iss nadi ka kinara har kisi ko nahi milta.

st: Dil ne tere pyar par majbur mujh ko kar diya,
s:
Dil ne tere pyar par majbur mujh ko kar diya,
Is jahaan ki har khushi se door mujh ko kar diya,
Jis kadar chaha tha dil ne pass tere aane ko,
Is kadar duniya ne tujh ko mujh se door kar diya.

st: Na milta gam to barbadi ke afasane kaha jaate,
s:
Na milta gam to barbadi ke afasane kaha jaate,
Duniya agar hoti chaman to veerane kaha jaate,
Chalo acha hua apno mein koi to gair nikla,
Sabhi agar  apne hote to begane kaha jaate.

st: Hamne kabhi kisi ko aazmaya nahi,
s:
Hamne kabhi kisi ko aazmaya nahi,
jitna pyaar diya utna kabhi paya nahi,
kisi ko hamari bhi kami mehsoos ho,
shayad aisa khuda ne hame banaya nahi.

st: Aansuo ki tarah aankho se na beh jana tum,
s:
Aansuo ki tarah aankho se na beh jana tum,
Dua hai kabhi hamari zindagi se na jana tum,
Maut ka dar nahi ye to ek din aani hai,
Bas dar hai hum se bichad na jana tum.

st: Pyar Jo Kisi Se Karoge Ruswayi Hi Milegi,
s:
Pyar Jo Kisi Se Karoge Ruswayi Hi Milegi,
Wafa Jitni Bhi Karoge Burayi Hi Milegi,
Chahe Kisi Ko Kitna Bhi Apna Bana Lo,
Jab Bhi Aankh Khulegi Tanhai Hi Milegi.

st: Ek Aadat Si Ho Gayi Hai Chot Khane Ki,
s:
Ek Aadat Si Ho Gayi Hai Chot Khane Ki,
Bheegi Hue Palko Sang Muskurane Ki,
Kash Anjam Wafa Ka Hum Pehle Hi Jante,
To Kosish Bhi Nahi Karte Dil Lagane ki.

st: Tum khafa ho gaye to koi khushi na rahegi,
s:
Tum khafa ho gaye to koi khushi na rahegi,
Tere bina chirago mein roshni na rahegi,
Kya kahe kya guzregi dil par,
Zinda to rahenge par zindagi na rahegi.
